entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Gimli
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:43 a.m. CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
